message: Let's make a deal. This offer benefits us both.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need a good chunk of the money to cover my costs. This is my final offer.
Bob, this is a better deal than my last offer and considers the impact of inflation on your share. Let's close this out.
Alice, with the inflation, I can't afford to give you more. Let's split it down the middle and end this.
